sentences.sContent: a bowl of daffodils, the first bright heralds of spring
sentences.sCn: 一盆水仙花，春天的第一个鲜明的预兆

words.tran: 纹章的；纹章学的；传令官的；司宗谱纹章官员的

trans.tranCn: 预告， 先兆；传令官 A <
trans.tranOther: someone who carried messages from a ruler in the past
to be a sign of something that is going to come or happen soon
